en: Two fair copies, variant, about 1853 and 1858. The first, part of a note to Susan Dickinson in March 1853, when she was in Manchester, New Hampshire, is in pencil, addressed "Susie" and signed "Emilie" (h b73).
The later copy appears in Fascicle 1 (a82-7/8), about summer 1858, with the first two lines combined.
Poems (1896), 200, from the fascicle (B), as two five-line stanzas. Poems (1955), 6-7 (A principal, B); CP (1960), 6-7 (A). Letters (1958), 226 (A). MB (1981), 17 (B), in facsimile. (J4)

Amherst - Amherst Manuscript #fascicle 82 - The gentian weaves her fringes - asc:15604 - p. 8

body.value:
F3B - On this wondrous sea

On this wondrous sea - sailing silently -
 Ho! Pilot! Ho!
Knowest thou the shore
Where no breakers roar -
Where the storm is o'er?

In the silent West
Many - the sails at rest -
The anchors fast.
Thither I pilot thee -
Land! Ho! Eternity!
 Ashore at last!

F9A - Oh if remembering were forgetting

Oh if remembering were forgetting -
 Then I remember not!
And if forgetting - recollecting -
How near I had forgot!
And if to miss - were merry -
 And to mourn were gay,
How very blithe the maiden
Who gathered these today!

P96-165 - ETERNITY

On this wondrous sea,
 Sailing silently,
 Ho! pilot, ho!
 Knowest thou the shore
 Where no breakers roar,
 Where the storm is o'er?

In the silent west
 Many sails at rest,
 Their anchors fast;
 Thither I pilot thee,
Land, ho! Eternity!
 Ashore at last!

Amherst College, Amherst MA

Publication History
Poems (1896), 200, from the fascicle (B), as two five-line stanzas. Poems (1955), 6-7 (A principal, B); CP (1960), 6-7 (A). Letters (1958), 226 (A). MB (1981), 17 (B), in facsimile. (J4). Franklin Variorum 1998 (F3B).
Letters (1894), 216, from the Bowles copy (B); also LL (1924), 255; and Letters (1931), 188. Poems (1896), 39, from Letters (1894), made composite with a reading from the fascicle in line 8. Poems (1955), 30 (A summarized, B principal); CP (1960), 21 (B). MB (1981), 16-17 (A), in facsimile. (J33). Franklin Variorum 1998 (F9A).
-History from Franklin Variorum 1998
